local_intent: Perceive the white plate, compute a top grasp, approach and align, execute pick, and verify ObjectInGripper.
assumptions: white_plate is detectable in the current view
gripper can open to width 0.09 and operate within specified timeouts
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: performs visibility check/scan, detection, open gripper, compute top grasp, approach with tight tolerance, pick, and verify.
